emuInput.TitMainTitle: Coach "Buddy" Parker handing football to Pittsburgh Steelers football player, on athletic field at Slippery Rock State Teachers College
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 24, reads: "Nine Negroes Among 22 Steeler Hopefuls - "Here, on the campus of Slippery Rock State Teachers College, Tuesday morning, the eager but cold eyes of Coach Buddy Parker were weighing the muscular symphony of 22 individual 1961 Pittsburgh Steelers' rookies, nine of whom were young men of color..."
